ygData.subject: RE: Guise of the Deceiver
ygData.msgSnippet: But in those cases, they ALWAYS work if they are equipped and never if they aren t. The DE illusion is not necessarily something you want to ALWAYS work when
ygData.messageBody:
But in those cases, they ALWAYS work if they are equipped and never if
they aren't. The DE illusion is not necessarily something you want
to ALWAYS work when you have a piece of armor on. (Or it could have
something to do with illusions dropping when you zone. You do not
lose armor when you zone, or have to put it back on. But the servers do
not pass illusion information from one zone to the next. Just character)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Josh Moore [mailto:josh@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 5:01 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Guise of the Deceiver
>
>
>From: "Josh Moore" <josh@...>
>
>You know, I do not see why they cannot make an item that has to be aquipped
>for the effect to work.
>Haste sashes work.. Cold/heat stones work. need I go on?;)
